Posts.EditableText: Is there a way to strike-through a sentence in Quest? I would post an example but Markdown doesn't have strike-through commands as far as I know.
Posts.HTML: Is there a way to strike-through a sentence in Quest? I would post an example but Markdown doesn't have strike-through commands as far as I know.

Posts.EditableText: Try this (using CSS and HTML): ``` msg("This is wrong") ```
Posts.HTML:
Try this (using CSS and HTML):

msg("<span style=\"text-decoration: line-through;\">This is wrong</span>")

Posts.EditableText:
Nope! This happened lol. I think I'd have to make it an expression. I'd rather keep it a msg for the time being. ``` Error running script: Error compiling expression '"Test



"': SyntaxError: Unexpected token "text" ; expected one of Line: 1, Column: 17 ```
Posts.HTML:
Nope! This happened lol. I think I'd have to make it an expression. I'd rather keep it a msg for the time being.

Error running script: Error compiling expression '"<span style=\\"text-decoration: line-through;\\">Test</span><br/><br/><br/><br/>"': SyntaxError: Unexpected token "text" <IDENTIFIER>; expected one of <EOF>Line: 1, Column: 17

Posts.EditableText: You have double backslashes in yours. This version will cause the roor you see: ``` msg("This is wrong")
Posts.HTML:
You have double backslashes in yours. This version will cause the roor you see:

msg("<span style=\\"text-decoration: line-through;\\">This is wrong</span>")
